data.name: Adfree Gelbooru w/ Dark Theme
data.description:
Whitelist the website in your adblocker first, then install this style! (this prevents site issues) Dark Theme is optional and can be deactivated in "customize settings" above.
Cleans a popular anime image catalogue website off all current ads and visual disturbances.
Also includes a few minor tweaks like a bigger page selection at the bottom.

data.name: W3Schools Dark Sublime (Fixed)
data.description: This is an updated version of W3Schools Dark Sublime style. Fixed the search popup, updated the page link to apply, themed some missing panels, the "try it" examples, and some buttons. Comment any missing element below and I'll try to fix it.

data.name: Good-ish Twitter (2020) + Dark mode & Dim mode
data.description:
Get a little bit of the old "good" Twitter feeling back. Basically combine the best parts of the old layout with the best parts of the new application. Recently added support for dark and dim modes all in one.

Moved navigation to a top bar instead of left-side column, with better notification indicators in the menu, and an overall "tighter" appearance. A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up. 

06-19-2020 - Fixed "new tweets" button cutoff. 
04-24-2020 - Fixed the profile thumbnail drop-down menu that was added recently. Fixed the top header bar positioning. 
08-21-2019 - Fixed sidebar search box positioning after the most recent update.
